languages.text: {n}Эмелина поднимается, отряхиваясь от грязи.{/n} "Я ожидаю, что архивы, найденные при раскопках, будут переправлены на ваше судно вместе со мной. В таком случае я смогу начать расчеты и подготовку к ритуалу заранее". {n}Савант смотрит на вас в упор.{/n} "Страх бессилен перед волей смелых, Лорд-капитан. Я верну светила там, где они были утрачены".

{n}Emelina rises, shaking off the dirt.{/n} "I expect the archives I discovered in the excavation to remain with me — we can be transported to your ship together. It will allow me to begin my calculations and preparations immediately." {n}The Sage holds your gaze.{/n} "Fear holds no power for the bold, Lord Captain. I will restore the stars that have been lost."
languages.original_text: {n}Эмелина поднимается, отряхиваясь от грязи.{/n} "Я ожидаю, что архивы, найденные при раскопках, будут переправлены на ваше судно вместе со мной. В таком случае я смогу начать расчеты и подготовку к ритуалу заранее". {n}Савант смотрит на вас в упор.{/n} "Страх бессилен перед волей смелых, Лорд-капитан. Я верну светила там, где они были утрачены".

languages.text: {n}艾米莉娜站起身来，抖落了身上的泥土。{/n}“那些在挖掘过程中发现的资料，我希望能留在我的身边。我可以带着这些资料一起上船，这样我就可以立刻开始进行计算，着手准备了。”{n}艾米莉娜凝视着你的双眼。{/n}“勇敢之人无所畏惧，舰长大人。我会让那些失落的恒星再次绽放光彩。”
languages.original_text: {n}Emelina rises, shaking off the dirt.{/n} "I expect the archives I discovered in the excavation to remain with me — we can be transported to your ship together. It will allow me to begin my calculations and preparations immediately." {n}The Sage holds your gaze.{/n} "Fear holds no power for the bold, Lord Captain. I will restore the stars that have been lost."

traits.locale_text: {n}艾米莉娜站起身来，抖落了身上的泥土。{/n}“那些在挖掘过程中发现的资料，我希望能留在我的身边。我可以带着这些资料一起上船，这样我就可以立刻开始进行计算，着手准备了。”{n}艾米莉娜凝视着你的双眼。{/n}“勇敢之人无所畏惧，舰长大人。我会让那些失落的恒星再次绽放光彩。”
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: {n}Emelina se levanta, sacudiéndose el polvo.{/n} «Espero que los archivos que descubrí en la excavación sigan conmigo; puede transportarlos a la nave junto a mí. Así podré comenzar los cálculos y los preparativos de inmediato». {n}La sabia sostiene tu mirada.{/n} «El miedo no tiene poder sobre los osados, Lord Capitán. Restauraré las estrellas perdidas».
languages.original_text: {n}Emelina rises, shaking off the dirt.{/n} "I expect the archives I discovered in the excavation to remain with me — we can be transported to your ship together. It will allow me to begin my calculations and preparations immediately." {n}The Sage holds your gaze.{/n} "Fear holds no power for the bold, Lord Captain. I will restore the stars that have been lost."

Así podré comenzar los cálculos y los preparativos de inmediato». {n}La sabia sostiene tu mirada.{/n} «El miedo no tiene poder sobre los osados, Lord Capitán. Restauraré las estrellas perdidas».
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: {n}エメリナが土を払いながら立ち上がる。{/n}「私が発掘して見つけたアーカイブは私の手元に残していただけるものと思っています。私たちは一緒にあなたの船に乗って運んでいただいてかまいません。これですぐに計算と準備を始めることができます」{n}賢者はあなたの視線を捉える。{/n}「勇敢な者に対し、恐怖は力を持ちません、ロード・キャプテン。失われた星は私が取り戻します」
languages.original_text: {n}Emelina rises, shaking off the dirt.{/n} "I expect the archives I discovered in the excavation to remain with me — we can be transported to your ship together. It will allow me to begin my calculations and preparations immediately." {n}The Sage holds your gaze.{/n} "Fear holds no power for the bold, Lord Captain. I will restore the stars that have been lost."

traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: {n}Emelina se lève en s'époussetant.{/n} « Je tiens à ce que les archives découvertes lors des fouilles restent en ma possession. Transportez-les avec moi jusqu'à votre vaisseau, cela me permettra de commencer immédiatement mes calculs et mes préparatifs. La peur n'a pas d'emprise sur les audacieux, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, {n}continue la sage en soutenant votre regard.{/n} Je ferai renaître les étoiles perdues. »
languages.original_text: {n}Emelina rises, shaking off the dirt.{/n} "I expect the archives I discovered in the excavation to remain with me — we can be transported to your ship together. It will allow me to begin my calculations and preparations immediately." {n}The Sage holds your gaze.{/n} "Fear holds no power for the bold, Lord Captain. I will restore the stars that have been lost."

traits.locale_text: {n}Emelina se lève en s'époussetant.{/n} « Je tiens à ce que les archives découvertes lors des fouilles restent en ma possession. Transportez-les avec moi jusqu'à votre vaisseau, cela me permettra de commencer immédiatement mes calculs et mes préparatifs. La peur n'a pas d'emprise sur les audacieux, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, {n}continue la sage en soutenant votre regard.{/n} Je ferai renaître les étoiles perdues. »
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: {n}Emelina erhebt sich und schüttelt den Dreck ab.{/n} "Ich will, dass die bei der Ausgrabung gefundenen Archive bei mir bleiben – wir können gemeinsam zu Eurem Schiff reisen. Dadurch kann ich sofort mit meinen Berechnungen und Vorbereitungen beginnen." {n}Die Weise begegnet deinem Blick.{/n} "Angst hat keine Macht über die Mutigen, Lord Captain. Ich werde die verlorenen Sterne wiederherstellen."
languages.original_text: {n}Emelina rises, shaking off the dirt.{/n} "I expect the archives I discovered in the excavation to remain with me — we can be transported to your ship together. It will allow me to begin my calculations and preparations immediately." {n}The Sage holds your gaze.{/n} "Fear holds no power for the bold, Lord Captain. I will restore the stars that have been lost."

traits.locale_text: {n}Emelina erhebt sich und schüttelt den Dreck ab.{/n} "Ich will, dass die bei der Ausgrabung gefundenen Archive bei mir bleiben – wir können gemeinsam zu Eurem Schiff reisen. Dadurch kann ich sofort mit meinen Berechnungen und Vorbereitungen beginnen." {n}Die Weise begegnet deinem Blick.{/n} "Angst hat keine Macht über die Mutigen, Lord Captain. Ich werde die verlorenen Sterne wiederherstellen."
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: {n}Emelina kalkıp üzerindeki tozu silkeliyor.{/n} "Kazıda keşfettiğim arşivlerin bende kalacağını tahmin ediyorum. Birlikte gemine nakledilebiliriz. Hesaplamalara ve hazırlıklara bir an önce başlamama olanak tanıyacaktır." {n}Âlim, gözlerinin içine bakıyor.{/n} "Korku, cüretkâr olanlara işlemez Lord Kaptan. Kaybedilen yıldızları yeniden oluşturacağım."
languages.original_text: {n}Emelina rises, shaking off the dirt.{/n} "I expect the archives I discovered in the excavation to remain with me — we can be transported to your ship together. It will allow me to begin my calculations and preparations immediately." {n}The Sage holds your gaze.{/n} "Fear holds no power for the bold, Lord Captain. I will restore the stars that have been lost."

traits.locale_text: {n}Emelina kalkıyor, üzerindeki tozu silkeliyor.{/n} "Kazıda keşfettiğim arşivlerin benimle kalacağını tahmin ediyorum. Gemine birlikte nakledilebiliriz. Hesaplamalarıma ve hazırlıklarıma bir an önce başlamama olanak tanıyacaktır." {n}Âlim gözlerinin içine bakıyor.{/n} "Korku, cüretkâr olanlara işlemez Lord Kaptan. Kaybedilen yıldızları yeniden oluşturacağım."
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina
